duties_responsibilities.duty: Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and social media via email, virtual calls, and meetings.
Participate in sales meetings and handle inbound inquiries. Follow up with leads and negotiate their joining of the B2B program.
Provide all the necessary information to help leads make a buying decision. Follow up and maintain relationships to help B2B contacts sell more products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
